0.title: Home
0.content: Hey there! . My name is Marcus Jacob. I’m a premed student that likes medical research, new cancer therapies, and whales. Thanks for being here. I write essays, articles, and other things. You can reach me via twitter or email .

2.title: Articles
2.content: Essays, articles, position papers, blog articles by MJ. Some previously published elsewhere. On path choices, especially for rebels . On attorney-client privilege . Risk tolerance and age . On knowledge asymmetry . Accessibility standards – destination or waypoint? . Experience blindness – a simulated screen reader experience for the sighted . On Universal Design . Parable of the deviant rose .
